channel.title: Portfolios on Alice Lin
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Alice Lin

item.title: Coastal Water Quality Dashboard at NASA DEVELOP
item.description: Monitoring coastal turbidity and chlorophyll-a with remote sensing, powered by Google Earth Engine.

item.title: Mapping Salmon Status and More
item.description: I created maps for an Earth Economics report on the sociocultural significance of salmon for Tribes and First Nations on the Pacific Coast.

item.title: Economic Analysis of Outdoor Recreation in Oregon
item.description: Spatial analysis, cartography, and design for an Earth Economics study on recreation in Oregon.

item.title: Advanced GIS Course at UBC
item.description: Here is a selection of maps for a few class assignments.

item.title: Google Earth Engine Mangrove Mapping Methodology
item.description: I worked with a team at Blue Ventures to develop a mangrove mapping tool in Google Earth Engine.

item.title: Economic Analysis of Washington State Parks
item.description: Spatial analysis, cartography, and design for an Earth Economics study on recreation in Washington State Parks.

item.title: Mangroves and Water Quality in Cambodia
item.description: For my proof of concept project for my masters program, I investigated mangrove forest fragmentation and coastal turbidity in Southwest Cambodia.

item.title: Mapping Inundated Wetlands in Alaska
item.description: For this NASA DEVELOP project, we used radar data to map wetlands.

item.title: Economic Analysis of the Lake Chelan Golf Course
item.description: Spatial analysis and cartography for an Earth Economics study on the Lake Chelan Golf Course.
